title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Bring instant holiday magic to any space with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath and Garland Set. This coordinated duo includes a lush 23.6-inch wreath and an elegant 8.8-foot garland, both brimming with snow-dusted pine needle branches, two styles of natural-looking pine cones, festive berry clusters, and frosted accents for a wintry, just-cut-from-the-forest look.

Warm, welcoming glow: 100 battery-operated LED lights cast a cozy, golden shimmer. Set the convenient timer once—6 hours on, 18 hours off—and enjoy effortless sparkle every evening without lifting a finger. No plugs, no mess, just pure holiday ambiance.

Style made simple: Ready to display right out of the box—no assembly required. Drapes beautifully over a fireplace, frames doors and windows, and elevates walls, living rooms, bedrooms, and dining spaces. Made for both indoor and outdoor use to greet guests with cheer at the front door or patio.

Crafted to last: Built from sturdy, high-quality, hypoallergenic materials with fireproof pins for added peace of mind. Designed to be maintenance-free—no watering, no shedding, and colors that never fade—so it looks stunning season after season.

Worry-free purchase: Backed by a 365-day warranty and 24/7 customer support.

Create a timeless holiday statement with a set that’s bright, beautiful, and brilliantly easy to enjoy. Just add three AA batteries and let the festivities begin.
